name: Zeus
domain: Sky, Thunder, Lightning, Law, Order, Justice
description: Zeus was the chief god of the Greek who ruled from Mount Olympus.

name: Hera
description: Hera was the queen of the gods, wife and sister of Zeus, and goddess of marriage and family.

name: Poseidon
description: Poseidon was the god of the sea, earthquakes, and horses, recognized by his trident.

name: Athena
description: Athena was the goddess of wisdom, warfare, and crafts, born fully armored from Zeus's head.

name: Apollo
domain: Music, Arts, Knowledge, Healing, Prophecy, Sun
description: Apollo was the god of music, arts, knowledge, healing, prophecy, and the sun.

name: Artemis
description: Artemis was the goddess of the hunt, wilderness, animals, and the moon.

name: Ares
description: Ares was the god of war, representing the violent and untamed aspects of battle.

name: Aphrodite
description: Aphrodite was the goddess of love, beauty, pleasure, and procreation.

name: Hephaestus
description: Hephaestus was the god of fire, metalworking, stone masonry, and sculpture.

name: Hermes
description: Hermes was the messenger of the gods and god of trade, wealth, luck, and travel.

name: Demeter
description: Demeter was the goddess of agriculture, harvest, fertility, and the cycle of life and death.

name: Dionysus
description: Dionysus was the god of wine, festivity, ritual madness, and theater.
